label: Possession in Great Measure
i_ching_name: Da You / Possession in Great Measure

shadow.name: COMPROMISE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Possession in Great Measure, expressing through compromise

gift.name: COMPETENCE
gift.description: The gift frequency of Possession in Great Measure, expressing through competence

siddhi.name: BOUNTEOUSNESS
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Possession in Great Measure, expressing through bounteousness

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 14 shadow frequency. The compromise you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural competence. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from compromise to competence.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your sacral. Notice the sensation of compromise.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 14 consciously for 7 days, the compromise pattern will shift toward competence.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 14 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from compromise toward competence
